title: Short* Cold War 2.0 - Episode 2 | 4 - 7-22
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary:
Join Jeff and Dave as we discuss the current conflict between Russia and Ukraine.  For this Short version of Cold War 2.0 Jeff gives an update on the war as it currently stands with some analysis. 

For the full episode on patreon, Jeff goes in depth into the possible use of Nuclear Weapons, current Air War, Russia's Logistical Problems and more.

Want the full Cold War 2.0 episode with personal opinions and in-depth analysis, become a patreon subscriber here: www.patreon.com/coldwarpodcast

description:
Join Jeff and Dave as we discuss the current conflict between Russia and Ukraine.  For this Short version of Cold War 2.0 Jeff gives an update on the war as it currently stands with some analysis. 

For the full episode on patreon, Jeff goes in depth into the possible use of Nuclear Weapons, current Air War, Russia's Logistical Problems and more.

Want the full Cold War 2.0 episode with personal opinions and in-depth analysis, become a patreon subscriber here: www.patreon.com/coldwarpodcast
